data: Ah, the alchemist! Ossono told me you'd arrived in... style.{break}I'm Ofelia, though you might hear some people call me Lina, too.{break}I'm the botanist in town. I whip up cures for what ails them.{break}{mood:like}I suppose you'll be doing that, too!

You know, I'm quite new to all this... dating... thing.{break}After my last break up, I poured myself into my work.{break}{mood:laugh}That was a loooong time ago.{break}{mood:like}So, I apologise if I'm not very good at it.{break}Dating has changed a lot since I was last in the game.{break}{mood:laugh}Did I say that right? "In the game"? I learn new slang from Gaiana.{break}Ugh, I feel so old saying things like that.{break}{mood:like}I don't even know what we're supposed to DO on a date.{break}{mood:laugh}Or how to flirt.
{mood:laugh}Oh, no, I don't think so.{break}That would just complicate things, don't you think?
You're only as old as you feel!
I think we should mix things up a little.{break}We could go somewhere new, perhaps?
Wait, I thought you were Gaiana's age?

{mood:laugh}Ha, very good.{break}{mood:like}Well, I still feel like I'm in my 20s. My joints say otherwise.{break}But the more I talk about being older, the older I feel... So I should stop!{break}I suppose it's just living on an island full of people in their mid-20s.{break}{mood:like}It can make you feel like the crypt-keeper!{break}I should get back home, now. It's getting late!
{mood:like}Did you fetch this from the tavern for me?{break}{mood:happy}That's so sweet of you! What a thoughtful gift.

{mood:laugh}Ha! It's been a while since someone's flirted with me so brazenly.{break}{mood:like}I like it.{break}I wasn't sure about you at first, but I think you'll get on just fine here.{break}Now, I'm sorry for being a buzzkill, as Gaiana would say, but I have to head home.{break}This has been nice. Thank you.
{mood:like}Oh, thank you!{break}{mood:happy}I have a lot of crafty hobbies, so I'll put this to good use!

{mood:laugh}Ha! Nice try.{break}{mood:default}I haven't been Gaiana's age for a while.{break}And honestly, I don't think I want to be on a date with someone who wants that.{break}I'm happy with who I am at my age. And I don't have the patience to mess around.{break}So, have a think about what you want, okay?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm going to go back home. Got to take my teeth out.
{mood:dislike}Perhaps you would be better off giving this to Zed in future.

So, by now you must have met almost everyone on Moonstone, right?{break}It must be strange, living in such a small place after the city.{break}It certainly makes social dynamics very different.{break}{mood:like}Did you know that Gaiana and Quill almost had a thing?{break}And Zed had a crush on Ferra for the longest time. Ferra never even knew.{break}I try to stay out of it, which isn't hard.{break}{mood:laugh}Most of them think of me as their mother, anyway.
{mood:dislike}I... am not sure what I'm supposed to do with this.
{mood:dislike}I should have known you were not serious about a date.{break}I should not have bothered.
Mahimbing ba ang tulog mo? Did you sleep well?{random}Magandang umaga, sinta! Good morning!
I was serious! I just forgot!
Kumain ka na? Have you eaten?

I... suppose so.{break}It's an easy role to slip into. I do care about them all so much.{break}With a small town like this, you don't have much choice over your role in the community.{break}I don't mind being the maternal figure, since it suits me just fine...{break}{mood:laugh}But I suppose that means no one really looks after me!{break}{mood:default}Oh, look at the time. I need to head home, sorry!{break}{mood:like}I hope we can do this again.
Maligayang Araw! Have a wonderful day!{random}Ingat sa daan. Be careful out there!

Well, yes and no.{break}I'm a naturally caring person, so it suits me, but sometimes it bothers me.{break}When people only look at you as a "mom", it can be lonely.{break}{mood:laugh}Also, everyone assumes I have my life together. That's DEFINITELY not the case!{break}{mood:default}Oh, dear. Look at the time. I have to dash, sorry!
Magkita tayo sa panaginip ko! See you in my dreams!

{mood:dislike}Oh, no. No no no.{break}I am not about to be anyone's... whatever that is.{break}No thank you.{break}I'm sure that was meant as a compliment... but the thing with compliments is that the receiver decides if it counts.{break}{mood:default}So, thank you, but no thank you.{break}I'm starting to get cold, so I'm going to head back home.{break}Good night.
Do you want to know a secret?{break}{mood:like}It is my birthday today.{break}Another year older. Another year... wiser?{break}{mood:laugh}I am not sure I feel any wiser. Just older.

I've been thinking about our past few dates, and I just wanted to say...{break}{mood:laugh}I'm so sorry about going on about my age so much!{break}{mood:like}I think everyone on Moonstone desperately needs a therapist, and you've sort of fallen into that role.{break}Like I've said before, you automatically fall into roles in a small community like this.{break}{mood:laugh}But I don't want to treat you like my therapist. I'm enjoying these dates!
{mood:like}A gift? That is incredibly sweet of you.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you, this is wonderful!
You can talk to me about feelings!
Y'all need more than a therapist.
How is your work going today?{break}{mood:like}Take care out there!

{mood:laugh}Oh, I'm glad.{break}{mood:like}It must feel like everyone's unloading their personal traumas onto you.{break}Just make sure you're setting personal boundaries, okay?{break}We don't want our newest addition to the place getting emotional burnout.{break}Come on, I'll walk you home.
Be careful on the more dangerous islands out there.{break}{mood:awkward}We are quite far from the nearest emergency doctor.

{mood:laugh}I appreciate that, and I intend to!{break}{mood:like}But there's a difference between mutual sharing and just being burdened with other people's baggage.{break}I've noticed you're very quiet... I think people see you as a good listener.{break}Try to set some personal boundaries, okay? You're not being paid to be a therapist!{break}Now, come on. I'll walk you home.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
Make sure you don't pick all the local flora, alright?{break}{mood:like}Leave some for me.

{mood:dislike}That's a little cruel coming from a newcomer.{break}Listen, everyone here has trauma and painful things in their past.{break}That's natural. That's human.{break}{mood:default}Set personal boundaries for yourself, by all means - but cut everyone a little slack, too.{break}Especially Gaiana. You don't know what she's been through.{break}I'm going to head back, now. Good night.
{mood:like}Oh... Moonstone Bracelets were a tradition back when I was young!{break}{mood:happy}Does this mean...?
I sincerely hope it rains tomorrow.{break}I don't feel like hand-watering the plants.

{npc:down}I don't know if I'll ever get tired of the view from up here.{break}{mood:sad}I wish I knew more about the cataclysm. Waldo was looking into it, but... well.{break}{mood:default}I try to see the positive side of things. Like this view.{break}The people down below... They never got to see it like this.{break}It's beautiful.
There's goodness even in the bad.
{mood:happy}Oh, what a beautiful gesture!{break}{mood:like}I would love to be your partner.{break}{mood:laugh}I think I'm a bit old for "girlfriend"!
How is the Spirit hunt going?
{mood:dislike}Hm. Back in my day, we took these things more seriously.
You're glad the world got destroyed?
{mood:like}I was just asking Gaiana if she'd seen you around!

{npc:left}{mood:like}That's true. Every cloud, and all that.{break}{mood:laugh}I've always thought that phrase is silly, though.{break}It's not even true.{break}{mood:like}We should say something like... "some showers bring rainbows".{break}Or, "it's always darkest before the dawn". My mother used to say that.{break}{mood:laugh}Oh, I'm waffling on, and it's getting late!{break}{mood:like}I'm going to walk myself home. Good night!
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
If you have any gossip, make sure to come to me first.{break}{mood:happy}I won't tell anyone. Unlike dear Gaiana.

{npc:left}{mood:laugh}Oh, I bet you say that to everyone.{break}{mood:like}But thank you all the same.{break}Honestly... it's been a while since I've been called beautiful.{break}{mood:happy}So I give you permission to compliment me as much as you like!{break}{mood:laugh}Just let me know if my head gets too big.{break}{mood:like}I'm sorry to end this lovely night, but I have to sleep.{break}I'll see you tomorrow!
{mood:sad}I am sorry, but... I don't think we're ready for that.
It is windy out there today! Be careful.

{npc:left}{mood:dislike}Obviously that's not what I'm saying.{break}No, it breaks my heart.{break}{mood:sad}The idea that I'll never get to see the real ocean, or the mountains...{break}{mood:dislike}But we can't just wallow, can we?{break}{mood:default}I'm glad for what I have.{break}{npc:down}And what I have... is this.{break}Let's call it a night. I'm getting tired.
Has Gaiana been a little standoffish with you?{break}I'll try to have a word with her.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet

-and my mother always taught me that the first sight of an Ice Spirit is good luck.{break}So, every winter, I run outside, hoping to be the first on the island to see one.{break}{mood:laugh}And now you just run around town with spirits following you!{break}{mood:happy}If you have an Ice Spirit... that would make it a lot easier.{break}I'll just have to break into your house on the first day of winter!
Ah, another tradition from my younger days...{break}{mood:sad}I suppose you are ending things, then.
I love hearing about traditions. Tell me more!
I can bring an Ice Spirit to you!
{mood:like}I hope you had a restful weekend.
I understand.{break}That's not to say I'm not sad...{break}But I appreciate you doing this honestly. Breaking up is hard.{break}I hope we can be friends, still.
{mood:like}Isn't Paolo's shop wonderful? They're so talented!

{mood:happy}Gladly! My family had so many.{break}{mood:like}Let's see, there was the clove in the rice...{break}Whoever got the clove in their serving was allowed to sit at the head of the table for the next meal.{break}And my father always recited "oro, plata, mata" when going up stairs.{break}"Gold, silver, death." Whichever was the last step was what you would get.{break}My aunt told me that not having a veil at my wedding was bad luck...{break}{mood:laugh}Hm, maybe that one was true.{break}{mood:happy}And my aunt also believed......
Really?{break}{mood:like}That's a relief... I was genuinely quite heartbroken!{break}{mood:laugh}Don't do that to someone my age, you might kill me!
Do you find it relaxing to raise your own plants?{break}{mood:like}For me, it is like meditation.

{mood:laugh}Oh, no, that would feel like cheating.{break}{mood:happy}Just, uh... just stand conspicuously in the square.{break}{mood:laugh}No, that's cheating too.{break}{mood:like}Okay, just don't tell me where you'll be.{break}If I have earned the luck, I shall get the luck!{break}Now, tell me about your family. Did you have any traditions...?
I think Quill is having a tough day.{break}Do you know him particularly well? He might appreciate a kind word.

Oh, come, now. I wasn't serious.{break}We don't have any kind of crime prevention here, anyway.{break}{mood:like}No one even locks their doors!{break}Maybe you're not used to that level of trust, coming from a bigger place?{break}Anyway, tell me about your family.{break}Did you have any traditions...?
It is windy out there today! Be careful.
{mood:like}It's almost time for fireworks!{break}{mood:happy}Would you like to watch them together?

That flying instrument of yours - you made it yourself?{break}{mood:awkward}Doesn't that make you nervous? Putting all your faith in something you made?{break}{mood:default}I could never do that. I know my strengths, and they are not in woodworking.{break}{mood:happy}Paolo's always been a natural at woodworking; my talents lie in botany.{break}{mood:like}What about you? What are your talents?
It's so wonderful to have you here, Alchemist.
I ran out of tea this morning.{break}Apologies if I'm a bit sleepier or grumpier than usual.
I think Ice Spirits are my favourite.{break}{mood:like}They are strangely beautiful, and if you listen close, they sound like snow crystals in a breeze.

{mood:like}Wow. That's impressive.{break}Well, we're glad to have someone like that around.{break}{mood:happy}But I hope you know that you are welcome here anyway.{break}{mood:like}The islanders here... we are kind. We are friendly.{break}{mood:dislike}We are not without our issues, of course.{break}{mood:like}But we will help you with anything you need.{break}{mood:happy}Now, are you having another drink? I will if you will!
I am hiding from Ossono.{break}{mood:dislike}She is trying to convince me to let her give me a makeover again.

{mood:laugh}That's a valuable trait to possess!{break}{mood:like}I am not brave, either. I am bold, which is different.{break}It takes me forever to make a decision about something important.{break}But sometimes, I will make spontaneous choices with no thought at all.{break}{mood:laugh}It infuriates Gaiana. She's very different to me.{break}{mood:happy}Now, are you having another drink? I will if you will!
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
{mood:dislike}I wish people would stop coming to me with their problems!
{mood:dislike}I am not an old lady!{break}...{break}I think I will settle up with Ossono.{break}You can pay for your own drinks.{break}{mood:angry}"Old lady." Hmph!

{mood:like}Oh! Hello, little Spirit!{break}This is for me? Oh, Alchemist...{break}{mood:happy}I didn't think I would get so emotional, but I'm so happy! Thank you, thank you!{break}{mood:like}You can have one of the plants in the Conservatory, as a thank you!
{mood:like}Have you heard any good gossip lately?

{mood:like}Alchemist, it is good of you to take on this quest.{break}I hope people are being grateful. I know that sometimes they forget to say please and thank you.{break}{mood:sad}And I am sorry... but I cannot accept this Spirit. It is only an Ice Spirit that reminds me of my mother, after all.{break}{mood:like}I still appreciate the work you are doing to help us all!
It is too cold to talk.

{mood:sad}I apologise if I am less than sparkling tonight.{break}{mood:default}This morning, Gaiana was upset about a mistake she had made at work.{break}And then Ossono wanted to talk about something personal.{break}Then Tobin needed treatment for a fishing-related wound...{break}Rowan wanted help with their inventory...{break}...And Zed wanted my opinion on a botanical study he's doing.{break}{mood:sad}I barely got any time to do anything for myself...
{mood:dislike}Oh, my joints are aching terribly today.{break}Winter makes me feel so much older than I am.
Don't you ever put yourself first?
{mood:like}Oh, thank you for taking care of that for me!{break}Here, take this as a token of gratitude.
I didn't ask you out to hear about other people.
Spring already? I swear the months are getting shorter.{break}{mood:laugh}Or I am simply getting older.

{mood:laugh}No! Never.{break}{mood:like}I worry that if I don't listen and help, no one will.{break}{mood:default}I just wish that someone would do the same for me, sometimes.{break}But who can I burden with my problems? No one.{break}Everyone else is too busy, or tired, or struggling with their own burdens.{break}I will be fine. I can take care of myself.{break}Shall we get another round?
I am glad for this rain.{break}{mood:like}The plants will be happy, too!

{mood:like}Thank you.{break}But honestly, there's a little bit of selfishness in there, too.{break}{mood:default}I need to keep this island running.{break}We can't afford to have people melting down or being unable to chip in.{break}If that task falls to me, then... I cannot say no.{break}{mood:like}But enough about me. Shall we get another round?
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met
{mood:like}It is Gaiana's birthday on the 28th.{break}{mood:happy}She likes rare plants... but any plant will do as a gift. Just in case you needed a hint!

{mood:sad}Oh, I apologise.{break}Now I suppose I am making it your problem.{break}{mood:default}Still... sometimes I wish someone could be Ofelia for me.{break}An Ofelia Senior, who could listen to ME and help ME.{break}{mood:sad}Ah, well.{break}{mood:like}Shall we get another round?
Are you... asking me to marry you?
{mood:like}It's nice to see a new face in town.{break}I hope I get get to know you better!
It's been so long since someone new came here.{break}I think the last newcomer was Zed, perhaps?

I used to work at this tavern, a long time ago.{break}{mood:laugh}I mean, not that long ago. I make myself sound ancient sometimes.{break}{mood:like}It was before Ossono ran it. I worked for a guy named...{break}{mood:dislike}Oh, what was his name? Ch...Chorbo? No. Chum...bus?{break}{mood:happy}Well, it's not important. He moved away before you were even born, probably.{break}{mood:like}Some nights, I'd be on my own. Cooking for everyone. Feeding everyone.{break}It felt... sacred. A task that they trusted me to fulfil.{break}Do you know what I mean?
{mood:like}Don't forget to bring me any spare seeds you find!{break}I can sell them, as long as I know how to grow them.
I think so. Tell me more.
I...{break}Wow.{break}I never thought I'd get married again. In fact, I even... swore I wouldn't.{break}{mood:love}But... I want to. I want to marry you. Yes. Yes!
If you find any seeds, bring them to me.{break}{mood:like}I can propagate them for you, and then you can buy as many as you need!
{mood:like}Discovering and growing new flora is one of my passions.{break}We have to keep our ecosystem alive, and help it flourish.
It's just pub food. It's not a religion.
Have you met Zed? He's relatively new to town, too.{break}{mood:happy}He's so lovely. A little shy, but who can blame him?{break}{mood:like}Moving islands is incredibly brave.

{mood:laugh}There's not much more to say!{break}{mood:like}I just enjoyed finding out what people needed, and giving it to them.{break}It's a satisfying thing.{break}I'm still figuring out what you need, though.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe you're the only person on Moonstone Island who doesn't need me at all!{break}So, did you ever work in retail...?
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
You must have met Ossono already - she's our tavern keeper.{break}{mood:like}She's a real firecracker. But she works too hard.

{mood:like}That's true.{break}And I suppose I also like being the one who solves a problem.{break}Sometimes people can't see a solution until someone else says it.{break}Sometimes, like with food, people just need a bit of outside help.{break}I'm good at that. So I might as well do it.{break}{mood:happy}Plus, selfishly, it makes me feel good.{break}Did you ever work in retail...?

{mood:like}Listen... I mean this in the kindest way possible...{break}Marriage is a big commitment. Something you should really only undertake with someone you know really well.{break}{mood:happy}But I like you... a lot. So let's see where our relationship goes, okay?
Everyone who lives here is very different.{break}{mood:laugh}But we're all united by one thing: Winding down on a Friday with a beer!

Well, anything can feel spiritual without being religious.{break}That's what I believe, anyway.{break}Spirituality is just the act of connecting with yourself and others on a deeper level.{break}And that's what I do. I connect with people.{break}I like to help, and I like to find solutions.{break}So, I'm guessing you never worked in retail? What did you do for work before this...?
{mood:happy}I know it's early, but there's a part of me that wants to matchmake you with people!{break}{mood:like}I think you'd get on with... well, no. I shouldn't say.
{mood:happy}Mabuhay ang bagong kasal! Congratulations! I hope you both live a long life of love.
Have you seen Gaiana? I do not have my glasses with me...{break}She has been drinking too much tonight, I think.{break}Excuse me. I must find her.
Gaiana can be... difficult.{break}But she's a good person. She's just very guarded.

{mood:like}Oh, I love these hot spring dates.{break}Lying in the warm water on a clear night? Perfection.{break}And I've been on my feet all day, too.{break}I wish there was a hot spring for your brain.{break}You could just take it out and let someone massage out all the knots.
Have you visited Ferra yet? She's our blacksmith.{break}{mood:like}She's an incredibly capable young woman.{break}{mood:happy}She knows it, too!
Talking to people can be like a brain spa.

On Sundays, I like to spend the whole day cooking adobo. It's stewing back in my kitchen!{break}{mood:like}My adobo is incredible. Ask anyone in town.{break}{mood:happy}Perhaps some day I can make some for you!
I don't think you WANT a smooth brain.
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
Just shut up and relax, Ofelia.
Honestly, the way people around here talk about the seasons incessantly...{break}{mood:laugh}You would think nothing ever happened here!{break}{mood:happy}Happy summer, anyway.

Hmm? Like, therapy?{break}We'll never get a therapist here on Moonstone.{break}{mood:laugh}Which is why I end up being everyone's therapist. Unpaid.{break}{mood:like}But I can talk to you, can't I? I guess that's what you meant.{break}Maybe one day I will.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe one day I'll be ready to take my brain to the spa.{break}I'm starting to think you'd be a good brain masseuse!{break}{mood:like}I think I'm ready to get out now, though. Shall we?
I can't believe you went all the way out there to close the rift. It must have been so dangerous.{break}{mood:like}I'm sure everyone is glad that you did it... I'm just glad that you came back safe.
{mood:dislike}You are out late...{break}Be careful. The spirits are dangerous at night.

{mood:laugh}Good point, good point.{break}{mood:like}But I wouldn't mind it being just a LITTLE smoother.{break}At the very least, my brain could do with a wash.{break}{mood:laugh}Too many cobwebs and old files in there.{break}{mood:like}I mean, I don't need to remember how to burp a baby any more.{break}{mood:happy}I could clear out all my baby knowledge and learn a new language, instead!{break}{mood:like}But for now, I'm content to just let the hot spring loosen up my body.{break}Maybe my brain can take the hint.{break}Are you ready to get out? I think I am.
I saw you talking to Gaiana the other day.{break}I know she's a tough nut to crack, but she's really worth the effort.
{mood:dislike}Alright, fine.{break}I thought dates were supposed to be about getting to know one another.{break}I'm shutting up now.
{mood:like} Oh, this bread smells just like my mama used to make. You are incredible, thank you!
{mood:sad}I hope Waldo is alright out there.{break}{mood:default}Have you seen him lately?
{mood:like}I feel as though we keep bumping into each other.{break}{mood:laugh}I am certainly not complaining!

I used to come out here to smoke, you know.{break}{mood:laugh}Terrible habit, but we all have at least one, right?{break}{mood:default}When I found out I was pregnant... I was so young.{break}But I stopped immediately. I changed everything.{break}I took care of myself... not better, necessarily, just differently. More carefully, maybe.{break}{mood:sad}I felt like such an awful mother to Gaiana for the longest time.{break}I hope I've made up for it.

I've been growing an exceptionally rare plant from the Old Kingdom just so I can gift it to the Great Spirit.{break}{mood:like}I hope it likes it!{break}Do you want to stay here with me so we can watch together?
I have been wondering...{break}Would it be okay to tell Paolo about us?{break}{mood:like}You do not need to answer right now. But think about it.
I know you have. Gaiana's fine.
Both my parents spoke Tagalog at home.{break}{mood:like}I don't get to practice much these days... although Rowan's trying to learn!
How are you finding Moonstone so far?{break}Have you met everyone yet?{break}{mood:like}The tavern on Friday is a great place to find everyone.
I didn't sign up to be a step-parent.

{mood:happy}Happy meteor day!{break}{mood:like}My parents used to take us to the top of a hill to watch the skies with no light pollution. It was stunning.{break}You can stay here with me and watch the meteors together, if you would like!

I have never told Gaiana this, but...{break}We almost named her Bernhilde.{break}{mood:laugh}Can you imagine? She is most definitely not a Bernhilde.{break}{mood:like}Although I still think it is a beautiful name.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe if I have another...

{mood:laugh}Ah, I guess she turned out okay.{break}{mood:like}Don't get me wrong, I'm so proud of her...{break}{mood:sad}But it sometimes feels like all her successes are hers, and all her mistakes are mine.{break}{mood:default}That's one part of parenthood no one tells you about.{break}All the imposter syndrome, all the anxiety you feel about your own life... that applies to your kids, too.{break}It's impossible not to make mistakes when raising a child.{break}{mood:laugh}You just have to hope the mistakes don't completely mess them up.{break}{mood:like}...Thank you for listening to me. You're a good person.
I've been trying to keep the language of my ancestors alive.{break}{mood:sad}It's hard when no one else here speaks it.

{mood:awkward}Oh... have I not told you?{break}{mood:like}Yes. Gaiana is my kid!{break}I'm so sorry, I... forgot you were new. Everyone else just knows already.{break}{mood:laugh}I must have dropped hints, surely?{break}{mood:default}I am truly sorry. But, well... now you know.{break}I hope it doesn't change anything between us...{break}But I'll give you time to think on it, okay?
{mood:like}Come over here, I would like to toast to you!{break}Thank you for bringing new life to our little town.

{mood:default}I understand... although you wouldn't be expected to be a step-parent.{break}My kid is all grown up.{break}Still... I'm sorry for springing that on you. I hope it doesn't change anything.{break}{mood:sad}I'll give you time to think. Goodnight.
{mood:like}I submitted my adobo, of course. My own secret family recipe!
Ferra can be a bit of a flirt, as I'm sure you've noticed.{break}{mood:laugh}Gaiana hates it... but I think secretly she has a crush.
I'm sure by now you've heard about Waldo.{break}{mood:sad}It was so difficult for Ossono when he left.
